ALL-TIME RECORD!
Lionel Messi breaks Gerd Müller's *record of 525 official goals for a single club, in Real Madrid's back garden.
#ElClásico
*This record is counting all official goals scored for one club in Europe's big five leagues. https://t.co/Av7NRf8rc4
